text: ivarkaḷ pūmiyil pirayāṇam ceytu taṅkaḷukku muṉṉar iruntavarkaḷiṉ muṭivu eppaṭiyiruntatu eṉpataip pārkka villaiyā? Avarkaḷ ivarkaḷai viṭa (eṇṇikkaiyil) atikamākavum, palattilum, pūmiyil viṭṭuc ceṉṟa ciṉṉaṅkaḷilum mikaittavarkaḷākavum iruntārkaḷ - eṉiṉum, avarkaḷ campātittatu (etuvum) avarkaḷukkup payaṉaḷikkavillai
